Package index

All functions

NCBI_ids
NCBI IDs Dataset
TaxSEA()
TaxSEA: Taxon Set Enrichment Analysis
TaxSEA_db
TaxSEA Database A dataset containing taxon sets. Each item in the list is a taxon set, and each member within a taxon set is a taxon.
TaxSEA_test_data
TaxSEA Test Data
get_ncbi_taxon_ids()
Retrieve NCBI Taxonomy IDs for a list of taxon names
get_taxon_sets()
Retrieve Taxon Sets from TaxSEA Library
taxon_rank_sets()
Taxon Rank Set Enrichment Analysis
